sections.heading: Conjunctive, disjunctive, or bothUnless the context clearly indicates otherwise:(1) The word "and" indicates the conjunctive;(2) The word "or" indicates the disjunctive;(3) When the article is phrased in the disjunctive, followed by the words "or both," both the conjunctive and disjunctive are inten
sections.text: Conjunctive, disjunctive, or bothUnless the context clearly indicates otherwise:(1) The word "and" indicates the conjunctive;(2) The word "or" indicates the disjunctive;(3) When the article is phrased in the disjunctive, followed by the words "or both," both the conjunctive and disjunctive are intended; and(4) The word "and" or "or" between the last two items in a series applies to the entire series.
